extension.name: kallyas
extension.author: Marius Hogas
extension.description:
Kallyas Template for Joomla

Created by Hogash Studio | hogash.com.

field.name: modernizr
field.label: Modernizr
field.description: Enable JavaScript modernizr.js in head (Recommended enabled)

field.name: pie
field.label: PIE
field.description: Enable PIE (CSS3 for IE 8+)

field.name: load_mootools
field.label: Load Mootools?
field.description: Load Mootools library? Maybe you are not using any mootools dependent extension so it's better to unload it for pagespeed purposes.

field.name: component_enabled
field.label: Display Component?
field.description: Turning this off stops the main component from displaying on the homepage. This can be useful if you would like to build your homepage from modules only.

field.name: compresscss
field.label: Compress Css stylesheets?
field.description: If enabled you will gain a huge speed advance. Best to be OFF when developing on the template.

field.name: demopanel
field.label: Enable DEMO Panel?
field.description: Enable the demo panel? Built mostly for demo purposes

field.name: menutype
field.label: Default Menu
field.description: Select a menu in the list

field.name: animation
field.label: Animation
field.description: How the dropdown menu will be displayed.
field.option: Fade In, Slide Down and Right

field.name: speed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Speed of the animation. slow, fast, def, or the number of milliseconds

field.name: delay
field.label: mouseOut Delay
field.description: The delay in milliseconds that the mouse can remain outside a submenu without it closing.

field.name: startLevel
field.label: Start Level
field.description: Level to start rendering the menu at. Setting the start and end levels to the same # and setting 'Show Sub-menu Items' to yes will only display that single level.

field.name: endLevel
field.label: End Level
field.description: Level to stop rendering the menu at. If you choose 'All', all levels will be shown depending on 'Show Sub-menu Items' setting.

field.name: showAllChildren
field.label: Show Sub-menu Items
field.description: Expand the menu and make its sub-menu items always visible.

field.name: has_chaser
field.label: Enable Chaser Menu?
field.description: This feature will add a secondary menu cloned from the main menu. It will appear only on scrolling.

field.name: mobilemenu
field.label: Enable Mobile Menu?
field.description: This feature will switch the current menu into a select list when the page is resized/viewed on mobiles.

field.label: Select font (Websafe)
field.description: Select a websafe font

field.name: font_body_google_enable
field.label: Enable Google Fonts?
field.description: Enable Google fonts to be embed in your website?

field.name: font_body_google
field.label: Select Font (Google)
field.description: The font will be loaded from Google's Webfont list. It will automatically override the webfont

field.name: font_body_google_style
field.label: Font Styles
field.description: These are the font weight sizes. You must add them separated with comma. The font weight sizes are: 200, 300, 400, 500, 700, 800, 900 >> 200 means ultra-thin, 900 means ultra bold. Please check first the google fonts website to see how many styles does this font has.

field.name: font_body_selectors
field.label: Affected Css Selectors
field.default: body, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
field.description: Write here the css selectors that will have the google font applied. Separate with comma.

field.name: font_elems_websafe
field.label: Select font (Websafe)
field.description: Select a websafe font

field.name: font_elems_google_enable
field.label: Enable Google Fonts?
field.description: Enable Google fonts to be embed in your website?

field.name: font_elems_google
field.label: Select Font (Google)
field.description: The font will be loaded from Google's Webfont list. It will automatically override the webfont

field.name: font_elems_google_style

field.label: Affected Css Selectors
field.default: div.pp_kalypso .ppt, .flex-caption, .nivo-caption, .info_pop .text, .playVideo, .textpop-style .texts > span, .ud_counter ul li, .video-container .captions .line, .newsletter-signup input[type=submit], .page-title, .subtitle, #sidebar .title, .shop-latest .tabbable .nav li a, .topnav > li > a, nav#main_menu > ul > li > a, .pricing_table .tb_header h4, .pricing_table .price, .process_box .number span, .shop-features .shop-feature, .shop-features .shop-feature > h4, .shop-features .shop-feature > h5

field.name: twitter_wig_id
field.label: Twitter WIDGET ID
field.description:
* ### HOW TO CREATE A VALID ID TO USE: ###
* Go to www.twitter.com and sign in as normal, go to your settings page.
* Go to Widgets on the left hand side.
* Create a new widget for what you need eg user timeline or search etc.
* Feel free to check exclude replies if you dont want replies in results.
* Now go back to settings page, and then go back to widgets page, you should
* see the widget you just created. Click edit.
* Now look at the URL in your web browser, you will see a long number like this:
* 345735908357048478
* Use this as your ID below instead!

field.label: Facebook OpenGraph Tags ( Find out more about Facebook Open Graph )

field.name: og_title
field.label: OG Title
field.description: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph

field.name: og_type
field.label: OG Type
field.description: The type of your object, e.g., 'movie'. See the complete list of supported types: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/opengraphprotocol/#types

field.name: og_image
field.label: OG Image
field.description: An image URL which should represent your object within the graph. The image must be at least 50px by 50px (though minimum 200px by 200px is preferred) and have a maximum aspect ratio of 3:1. We support PNG, JPEG and GIF formats. You may include multiple og:image tags to associate multiple images with your page.

field.name: og_url
field.label: OG URL
field.description: The canonical URL of your object that will be used as its permanent ID in the graph, e.g. http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117500/

field.name: og_sitename

field.description: A human-readable name for your site, e.g., 'IMDb'.

field.name: og_description
